Android XML Processing with the XmlPullParser - Tutorial
Lars Vogel
2011 2012 2013 2014 vogella GmbH
15.09.2014
Version 1.3
XML processing with Android This article describes how to process XML with Android. It is based on Eclipse 4.4, Java 1.6 and Android 4.4.
